body: Vampire endurance + everyday = An unfathomable stench of sex through out the school. That was pretty interesting and I liked the idea of Vampires in this one. The only thing that kinda throws me a little off is the artstyle is pretty good and mature, reminds me a little of a manga artstyle (kinda reminds of Rosario+Vampire, not just the artstyle but in general with the story and whatnot.) but the females are kinda tall and have extraordinary proportions kinda feels like a shota to me just because of that "but".
